author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SenestechQ1 Loss Per Share $0.16
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - SenesTech Inc:
* SENESTECH ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATIONAL RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 * REVENUES FROM PRODUCT SALES DURING Q1 2018 WERE $19,000, COMPARED TO $7,000 OF REVENUE FROM PRODUCT SALES DURING Q1 2017
* CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND HIGHLY LIQUID INVESTMENTS AT END OF Q1 WERE APPROXIMATELY $4.8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
